posts.postText:
Hey i would like to ask if kryzoid or pirate would be so kind as to give me the inventory of another account i use (outbreak95) to the popman818 account.
The reason i am requesting this is i do no longer have access to the account outbreak95 because the owner did not tell me the password he changed it to.

Sure thing, I'll do it once you clear your inventory out on your current account, then I'll drop your old inventory in.

One thing, though, why didn't you just use your own account in the first place?
well sometimes one of my friends want to use their account so i have to use the other account and my inventory is all clear for you :)
